content.en: The 2014 BJS Prize was announced and presented at the BJS 2014 Annual Public Lecture on 6 November 2014. Bruno Latour and his co-authors, Pablo Jensen, Tommaso Venturini, Sebastian Grauwin and Dominique Boullier, were rewarded for their paper "The whole is always smaller than its parts" a digital test of Gabriel Tardes' monads. Listen to the BSJ Prize podcast by Bruno Latour: Bruno Statement on BJS Award
content.fr: Le Prix du BSJ 2014 a été attribué, le 6 novembre dernier lors de la cérémonie annuelle, à Bruno Latour et ses co-auteurs, Pablo Jensen, Tommaso Venturini, Sebastian Grauwin et Dominique Boullier pour leur article "The whole is always smaller than its parts" a digital test of Gabriel Tardes' monads. Ecoutez le podcast du BSJ Prize par Bruno Latour: Bruno Statement on BJS Award

title.en: British Journal of Sociology Prize awarded to Bruno Latour and his co-authors
title.fr: Le Prix du British Journal of Sociology 2014 pour Bruno Latour et ses co-auteurs
